2.content: Design Image Upload & Queue System UI/UX
2.details:
Design interface for:
- Image Upload interface (drag-and-drop, file browser)
- Image Queue Manager (drag-and-drop reordering, thumbnails)
- Image Categories/Tags system
- Image Display Controls (show, hide, transition effects)
- Integration with existing YouTube Video Player dashboard
- Add 'Images' tab to existing control dashboard
- Update OBS broadcast view to support both videos and images
- Image preview and metadata display

3.details:
Implement:
- Supabase Storage bucket for image uploads
- Image upload component (drag-and-drop + file browser)
- Image queue management system
- Database tables: image_queue, image_history
- Image display in OBS broadcast view
- Real-time sync between control panel and OBS view
- Image transitions/animations
- Support for various image formats (JPG, PNG, GIF, WEBP)
- Image metadata tracking (filename, size, upload date, tags)
- Queue operations: add, remove, reorder, clear
- Integrate into existing /video-player route as new tab
- Update /broadcast/video-player to handle image display
